src_text: kwindlela yohlumo lwezoqoqosho ethembakeleyo, ezinzileyo nedibene ngokuphilisayKwakhona iKhabhinethi iyawamkela amanyathelo abalulekileyo okugcina iindleko ziphantsi kwemo elawulekayo kwaye ikwazibophelela ekusebenzisaneni nawo onke amacandelo ekwenzeni igalelo kwilinge elidibeneyo lesizwe ukuphumeza umlima-ndlela omiselwe luhlahlo lwabiwo-mal IKhabhinethi iyakwamkela ukumiselwa kweQela looNondaba likaMongameli (i-PPC) nguMongameli uJacob Zum I-PPC izakuquka abahleli bezopolitiko, iintatheli zezopolitiko, oonondaba bezopolitiko neentatheli zezoqoqosho eziqinisekisiweyo ukuba zizo ezinegunya lokukhupha ingxelo nge-Ofisi kaMongameli ngokupheleleyo zihlale zisenza njalo rhoq
trg_text: This budget demonstrates our resilience, commitment and resourcefulness as we navigate through this worst economic period in recent historThe budget responds to what the country needs and creates confidence in the economy by placing the country on a credible, sustainable and viable inclusive economic growth patCabinet further welcomes the decisive cost-containment measures and commits to working together with all sectors in contributing towards a collective national effort to implement the course set by the budge Cabinet welcomes the launch of the Presidential Press Corps (PPC) by President Jacob Zum The PPC will comprise political editors, political correspondents, political reporters and economics journalists who have been accredited to cover The Presidency on a full-time and ongoing basiThe purpose of the PPC is to provide improved access to information by the medi It will also improve access by the media to the President and The Presidency, in order to ensure that journalists also obtain background information and processes to enhance their understanding and reportin The press core members will also receive briefings from the Deputy President and any Minister that the President invites to share programmes of national importanc Cabinet has expressed appreciation of the contribution that South Africa has made towards restoring peace in Burundi, in line with our foreign policy commitments to ensure a peaceful and stable continenIt further welcomed the outcomes of the inclusive Inter-Burundian Dialogue held during the visit by the African Union (AU) high-level delegation of Heads of State and Government to Bujumbura in Burundi, which was led by President Zum

src_text: Injongo ye-PPC kukubonelela amajelo eendaba ngokufikelela okuphuculiweyo kulwaz Iza kuphucula ukufikelela kwamajelo eendaba kuMongameli ne-Ofisi kaMongameli, khona ukuze iqinisekise ukuba iintatheli nazo zifumana ulwazi neenkqubo ezizeleyo ukuze kuphucuke indlela ababhala kunye nabazikhupha ngayo iindab Amalungu eliqelaloonondaba aza kuthatha inxaxheba kwiitlanganiso noSekela-Mongameli okanye nawuphi na uMphathiswa omenyiweyo nguMongameli ukuba babelane ngeenkqubo ezibalulekileyo kwisizw
trg_text: Cabinet reiterates the message by President Zuma on the need to respect the institutions and processes created in terms of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996 and the la President Zuma is dealing with the matter of the South African Revenue Service Commissioner and the Minister of Finance through the correct channels using correct legal prescriptThe President is putting measures in place to address the issues responsibly and amicably for the benefit of al Cabinet calls on all interested parties to exercise calm and restraint, and allow space for the matters to be resolved using correct channel Cabinet calls on all South Africans to register for the 2016 Local Government Elections on 5 and 6 March 2016.

src_text: ngethuba igqiza eliphezulu leeNtloko zemiBuso nooRhulumente leMbumba yase-Afrika (i-AU), ebelikhokelwa nguMongameli uZuma, belityelele eBujumbura eBurund IKhabhinethi iyakwamkela ukuchongwa kukaMongameli uZuma nguNobhala Jikelele weZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UN) uBan Ki-moon, ukuba abe ngusihlalo wesibini kwiKhomishini ePhezulu yeNgqesho kwezeMpilo noHlumo lwezoQoqosho ebambisene noMongameli u-Fran ois Hollande weRhiphabliki yaseFranc Asikuko okokuqala ukuba uMongameli uZuma achongwe ngumbutho wehlabathi ukuba enze umsebenzi kwimibutho yehlabathLe khomishini iza kuvuselela ukudalwa kwamathuba amatsha emisebenzi kwicandelo lezempilo kuwo onke amazwe jikelele, ingakumbi kulawo aphuhliswe kancinc Oku komeleza nokuphunyezwa kwe-Ajenda yoPhuhliso oluZinzileyo yowama-2030, eza kunceda kakhulu ukuhlangabezana nemingeni entlantlu-ntathu yentswela-ngqesho, indlala nokungalingan IKhabhinethi iyakwamkela ukumiselwa koPhando lweSizwe loLuntu
trg_text: Cabinet welcomes the appointment of President Zuma by the United Nations (UN) Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon, to co-chair a High-Level Commission on Health Employment and Economic Growth with President Fran ois Hollande of the Republic of Franc This is not the first time that President Zuma has been appointed by a world body to undertake work at a global stag This appointment is in recognition of the sterling leadership displayed by our President in the international arenThe commission will stimulate the creation of new employment opportunities in the health sector across all countries, especially in least developed one This also strengthens the implementation of the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development, which will go a long way to addressing the triple challenge of unemployment, poverty and inequalit Cabinet welcomes the launch of the 2016 National Community Survey in Mamelodi, Pretoria by the Minister in The Presidency Jeff Radebe and the Statistician-General Pali Lehohl This year s survey is being undertaken under the theme:

trg_text: Cabinet notes with concern the report presented by the World Health Organisation and the Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development to the Health Market Enquiry headed by Justice Sandile Ngcob The reports indicate that South Africa provides the most expensive medical services when compared with other countrie Cabinet will await the conclusion of the enquiry before pronouncing on this matter2.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuba urhulumente abe lelinye lamahlakani aza kusingatha iNgqungquthela yeZizwe-ngezizwe kaGawulayo yama-21 (i-AIDS 2016) ndawonye noNombutho eHlabathi kaGawulayo kwiZiko leNgqungquthela yeZizwe ngezizwe (i-ICC) eDurban ukususela ngomhla we-18 ukuya kowama-22 kweyeKhala yowama-2016.
trg_text: It provides a coordinated approach to the implementation of efforts to reduce domestic fuel burnin The intervention is to ensure these areas comply with the National Ambient Air Quality Standard This focused strategy will support the existing national strategy to address air pollution in the countr Cabinet approved the co-hosting of the 21st International AIDS Conference (AIDS 2016) between government and the International AIDS Society at the International Convention Centre (ICC) in Durban from 18 to 22 July 2016.

src_text: Ukusingatha le ngqungquthela kuza kuqhubela phambili indlela ilizwe lethu elihlangabezana ngayo neeNtsholongwane kaGawulayo (i-HIV) nesifo sephepha (i-TB) ngeli xesha kwangaxesha nye lisenza impembelelo komnye weyona mingeni iyeyona ibalulekileyo eMzantsi Afrika, kummandla welizwekazi nakwihlabathLe ngqungquthela iza kubonelela abaphandi abavela kwiinkalo zonke zehlabathi ngeqonga lokwabelana ngeenkqubo zobunzululwazi zala maxesha kweli candelo, ukufunda kubuchule bomnye nomnye nokuphuhlisa ubuchule bokuqhubela phambili onke amacala kumalinge wethu ahlangeneyo okunyanga nokuthintela i-HIV Umthetho oYilwayo IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukungeniswa koMthetho-siHlomelo wezoThutho zaseMhlabeni weSizwe wama-2015 ePalamente, ohlomela uMthetho wezoThutho zaseMhlabeni weSizwe, wama-2009 (uMthetho we-5 wama-2009).
trg_text: Hosting the conference will advance our country s HIV and tuberculosis response whilst impacting on one of the most important challenges in South Africa, the region and the worlThis conference will provide a platform for researchers from across the world to share the latest scientific advances in the field, to learn from one another s expertise and to develop strategies for advancing all facets of our collective efforts to treat and prevent HIV Bill Cabinet approved the submission of the National Land Transport Amendment Bill of 2015 to Parliament, which amends the National Land Transport Act, 2009 (Act 5 of 2009).

src_text: Ezi zilungisoo zoMthetho wezoThutho zaseMhlabeni wama-2009 ziza kuqhubela phambili inkqubo yokuguqula nokumisela ngokutsha inkqubo yezothutho zasemhlabeni yesizw Oku kuza kwenza igalelo kwinkonzo yezothutho kawonkewonke ekhuselekileyo, efikelelekayo, enobuchule nesebenzayLo Mthetho uYilwayo ubonelela ngophuhliso olutsha kwicandelo lezothutho kawonkewonk Ubonelela ngesikhokelo ekukho phakathi kwaso, izithuthi ezingezo moto; iinkonzo zezothutho ezibizwa ngezixhobo zobuchwephetshe nokuphawulwa kwezithuthi zikawonkewonke ngokutsha ngokusebenza ngendlela ephucukiley Ukwabonelela ngokucacisa ngengcaciso kwinkqubo yokudluliselwa kwamagunya nemimiselo ngokumayela nokukhutshwa kweelayisenisi zokuqhuba izithuthi zikawonkewonkLo Mthetho uYilwayo uza kubonelela ngokuqaliswa koThungelwano lwezoThutho lukaWonkewonke oluDibeneyo kwaye luyinxalenye yeProjekthi ye-7 yesiCwangciso seziSeko ezinguNdoqo seSizwe, sigxile ekusebenziseni uphuhliso olulungeleleyo ezidolophini nothungelwano lwezothutho oludibeneyo ukumisela izixeko njengonobangela wohlumo Imisitho ezayo UMongameli uZuma uza kuya luTyelelo lwasebuRhulumenteni kwiFederal Republic of Nigeria ukususela ngomhla we-8 ukuya kowe-9 kweyoKwindla yowama-2016.
trg_text: The amendments to the National Land Transport Act of 2009 will further the process of transforming and restructuring the national land transport syste This will contribute towards a safer, accessible, efficient and effective public transport servicThe Bill provides for new developments in the public transport secto The Bill provides guidance in, amongst others, non-motorised transport; e-hailing transport services and branding of public transpor It further provides administrative clarity on the delegated powers and regulations in respect of the issuing of public transport operating licenseThis Bill will also enable the roll-out of the Integrated Public Transport Networks and it forms part of the National Infrastructure Plan and the Strategic Integrated Project 7, which focus on using coordinated development of urban and integrated transport networks to establish cities as engines of growth Upcoming events

src_text: Olu tyelelo lwasebuRhulumenteni luza kuqinisa ubudlelwano obuphakathi kwalamazwe mabini nokuqhubela phambili urhwebo oluphakathi kwemimandla yala mazw INyanga yamaLungelo oLuntu kweyoKwindla yowama-2016 iza kubhiyozelwa phantsi komxholo othi:
trg_text: The plan provides the basis for a public policy against racial discrimination that will assist in giving effect to our international human rights obligation The Russia-Africa Anti-Drug Dialogue at the ICC in Durban from 8 to 9 March 2016 provides a platform to enhance the National Drug Master Plan (2013-2017).The fight against illicit drugs is in line with the National Development Plan and the dialogue is under the auspices of the AU in pursuit of the obligations in terms of the relevant UN Drug and Transnational Organised Crime Conventions, AU Plan of Action on Drug Control (2013-2017) and BRICS (Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa) resolutionThe conference is a follow-up session of the Russia-Africa Anti-Drug Dialogue, which aims to present a consolidated position in how world leaders intend to tackle the international drug proble This will be tabled at the UN General Assembly Special Session in April 2014.

src_text: INgqungquthela ye-Russia ne-Afrika yokuLwa neziYobisi kwi-ICC yaseDurban ukususela ngomhla we-8 ukuya kowe-9 kweyoKwindla yowama-2016 lubonelela ngeqonga lokuqinisa isiCwangciso esiyiNtloko seziYobisi seSizwe (sowama-2013-2017).Umlo wokulwa iziyobisi ezingekho mthethweni uyahambelana neSicwangciso soPhuhliso seSizwe kwaye le ngqungquthela iphantsi kwemiqondiso emihle ye-AU ukusebenzela isibophelelo ngokwemimiselo efanelekileyo ye-UN yeziVumelwano zoLwaphulo-mthetho oluHleliweyo Phakathi kwaMazwe amaBini neziYobisi, isiCwangciso soMsebenzi se-AU (2013-2017 nezindululo zamazwe e-BRICS (i-Brazil, Russia, India, China noMzantsi Afrika).
trg_text: Cabinet congratulates film producer, Mr Anant Singh, for being awarded third place for the film Shepherds and Butchers in the Panorama Audience Award for Fiction Film at the Berlin International Film Festiva This is a major achievement as the film competed against 51 feature-length films from 33 countries AppointmentsAll appointments are subject to the verification of qualifications and the relevant clearanc Extension of the contract for Mr Lionel October as the Director-General (DG) in the Department of Trade and Industry, for a period of five year Appointment of Dr Mantlhake J Maboya as the Deputy DG (DDG): Curriculum Policy and Monitoring in the Department of Basic Educatio Appointment of Ms Shamilla Chettiar as the DDG: Policy and Knowledge Services in the Department of Touris Appointment of Mr Mbulelo Tshangana as the DG in the Department of Human Settlement Reappointment of Mr Kutoane Obed Kutoane as the Chief Executive Officer of the Export Credit Insurance Corporation of South Africa SOC Limite Appointment of Mr Vuyo Mafata as the Compensation Commissioner: Compensation Fund in the Department of Labou Appointment to the Takeover Regulation Panel for a period of five years:a) Ms Neo Phakama Dongwana (Chairperson);b) Prof Stephanie Marie Luiz (Deputy Chairperson);c) Prof Shirley Zinn (panel member);d) Adv Rory Voller (designate member);e) Ms Wendy Ndlovu (designate member);f)

src_text: Le ngqungquthela ilandela iNgqungqthela ye-Russia ne-Afrika yokuLwa iziYobisi, eligxile ekubonakaliseni imo edibeneyo yokuba iinkokheli zehlabathi zizimisele kangakanani ukuqubisana neengxaki yeziyobisi phakathi kwezizwe ngezizw Esi sicwangciso siza kuthiwe thaca kwiNdibano eNkulu eKhethekileyo ye-UN kwekaTshazimpunzi yowama-2016.
trg_text: Cabinet condemns the violent student protests, which have disrupted studies at some universities and led to the destruction of propert These protests deprive deserving students the opportunity to further their studies and impacts upon their right to higher educatio Government has opened channels of communication with all higher-education stakeholders for discussions and dialogue This has resulted in the restoration of normality and the promotion of social cohesion in our universities that seeks to find solutions to the medium- to long-term challenges linked to the transformation of the sector as described in the resolutions of the 2015 Higher Education Transformation SummiCabinet supports the efforts by law-enforcement agencies to ensure that the culture of learning is restored, and that property and the rights of individuals are protecte The rule of law is paramount and should be upheld at all time Normality and calm must return in our universities so that the academic programmes can continue while the medium- to long-term challenges are addresse

trg_text: Cabinet applauded the students who stood united against racism and anti-white chauvinism, which serves as an example that we can all work together to build on the progress and gains made in the tertiary education sector in preparation for this academic yea We must protect that progress and allow order to be restored and preserved at all our universitieCabinet also calls upon all stakeholders to work together so that our universities become leaders of inclusive engagement and transformatio Cabinet notes the proposed merger of three bottling operations for the Coca Cola Company in South Afric Cabinet notes the matter will be heard before the Competition Tribuna Cabinet expresses its concern at proposed job losses and reduction in employment in merger transaction In view of the high levels of unemployment, Cabinet calls on companies to ensure jobs are not lost and aggregate employment levels are maintaine Cabinet congratulates the South African Ambassador to the World Trade Organisation (WTO), Mr Xavier Carim, who has been elected to chair the Dispute Settlement Body of the WTO General Counci The General Council is the highest decision-making body of the WTO in between the Ministerial Conferenc The appointment of Ambassador Carim is in part recognition of the important role South Africa plays in the WTO and in part testimony to Ambassador Carim s qualitie Cabinet noted Barclays PLC s announcement of its intention to reduce its 6per cent shareholding in Barclays Africa Group Limited (BAGL) over the next two to three year Barclays PLC, in particular the CEO, has engaged both the National Treasury and the Reserve Bank in an open dialogue, and we welcome the company s commitment to implement its new strategy in a way that will minimise the impact on the economies in which BAGL operate The Reserve Bank will work with Barclays PLC and BAGL to ensure that any potential risks from the transaction are mitigated and appropriate measures will be taken to manage capital flows arising from the transactio Cabinet salutes all the finalists and winners of the National Teaching Awards which took place on 27 February 2016.

src_text: nokukhangela isimo sokuba ubhalisile na, iinombolo yewadi kunye nokuba simi phi isikhululo sakho sokuvot Zonke ii-ofisi zeSebe lemiCimbi yezeKhaya ziza kuba zivuliwe ukususela ngentsimbi ye-08:00 ukuya kweye-17:00 ngomhla we-5 nowe-6 kweyoKwindla yowama-2016, oku kuhambelana kunye namaxesha okusebenza eKhomishini yoNyulo eziMeleyo kwezi ntsuku zimbinIKhabhinethi ibongoza lonke ulutsha kunye nabo baza kuqala ukuvota ukuba babhalisele ukuvot Ngokuvota kwakho uthathe inyathelo elibhekisele ekubeni ilizwi lakho livakale ekuthathweni kwezigqibo ezikuchaphazelayo nendawo ohlala kuy Oorhulumente basekhaya baxhomekeke kuw IKhabhinethi iyalugxeka uqhankqalazo olunobundlobongela lwabafundi, noluthe lwaphazamisa izifundo kwezinye iidyunivesithi laze lakhokelela ekutshatyalalisweni kwezakhiwo nempahl Aba baqhankqalazi bathintela abafundi abanelungelo ilungelo lokuqhuba ngezifundo zabo kwaye oko kunempembelelo engekho ntle kwilungelo labo lokufumana imfundo ephakamiley Urhulumente uvulele bonke abadlali-ndima ababalulekileyo kwezemfundo ephakamileyo iinkqubo zonxibelelwano ukwenzela iingxoxo nothethathethwan Oko kukhokelele ekubuyeleni kwisiqhelo nokukhuthazwa kwentalo-ntle kwiidyunivesithi zethu ezifuna ukufumana isisombululo kwimingeni yexesha eliphakathi ukuya kweyelide edibene nokudalwa kwenguqu kwelicandelo njengoko ichazwe kwizindululo zeMbizo yeNguqu kwezeMfundo ePhakamileyo yowama-2015.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iyawaxhasa amalinge awenziwe zi-arhente zogcino-mthetho ukuqinisekisa ukuba isithethe sokufunda sibuyiselwe, kunye nokukhuselwa kwempahla nesakhiwo namalungelo womntu ngamny Ukulawula komthetho kubaluleke kakhulu kwaye kufanele kuhlonitshwe ngamaxesha onk Ukubuyela esiqhelweni nenzolo kwiidyunivesithi kuyafuneka ukuze iinkqubo zezemfundo zikwazi ukuqhubeka ngeli xesha imingeni yexesha eliphakathi nelide kusazanywana nay
